alert.note: Alert for Camden; Miller; Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:48AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Miller, northwestern Pulaski and eastern Camden Counties through 415 AM CDT... At 347 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eldon to near Osage Beach to near Macks Creek. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake of The Ozarks State Park... Ha Ha Tonka State Park... Lake of The Ozarks... Osage Beach... Camdenton... Richland... Lake Ozark... Iberia... Saint Elizabeth... St. Elizabeth... Linn Creek... Tuscumbia... Bagnell... Brumley... Lakeside... Ulman... Etterville... Freedom... Kaiser... Marys Home... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for central Missouri.
